summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingBYOMA's Barrier Repair Eye Cream is antioxidant rich, super hydrating, and formulated to recharge and rejuvenate dry, tired undereyes.
details: DetailsBenefitsHelps to deliver lasting hydration + reduce fine linesIncreases elasticity + firmness around the eye area​Leaves skin under the eyes smooth + supple​Strengthens the skin’s natural moisture barrierClinically proven to provide instant moisturization up to 82%Clinically proven to immediately reduce wrinkles up to 32%Clinically proven to reduce dark circles + pigmentationClinically proven to reduce eye bag volume + puffinessClinically proven to maintain + protect skin barrierFeaturesDermatologist tested + approved skincareAlcohol & fragrance-freeKey IngredientsBARRIER LIPID COMPLEXCopper tri-peptides help collagen synthesis and the synthesis of other important skin-identical ingredients like elastin to produce a potent antioxidant effect.​ECTOINItem 2635367How To UseMassage 1 pump in circular motions around eye area, then gently tap into skin.IngredientsAqua (Carrier), Glycerin (Skin-Conditioner), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride (Skin-Conditioner), Dipropylene Glycol (humectant), Caprylic/Capric/Succinic Triglyceride (thickener), Butylene Glycol (humectant), Phenyl Trimethicone (Skin-Conditioner), Cetyl Ethylhexanoate (Skin-Conditioner), Polyglyceryl-2 Stearate (emulsifier), Cetearyl Alcohol (viscosity controller), Glyceryl Stearate (emulsifier), Stearyl Alcohol (emulsifier), Hyaluronic Acid (Skin-Conditioner), Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid (Skin-Conditioner), Sodium Hyaluronate (Skin-Conditioner), Ectoin (emollient), Propanediol (Skin-Conditioner), Copper Tripeptide-1 (Skin-Conditioner), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter (Skin-Conditioner), Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Extract (antioxidant), Glycereth-26 (emulsifier), Ammonium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate (film former), Thamnolia Vermicularis Leaf Extract (antioxidant), Vinyl Dimethicone (thickener), Coptis Japonica Root Extract (antioxidant), Hydroxyacetophenone (antioxidant), Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer (thickener), Dextrin (film former), Sphingolipids (Skin-Conditioner), Tromethamine (pH adjuster), Ethylhexylglycerin (Skin-Conditioner), Ceramide NP (Skin-Conditioner), Disodium EDTA (chelating agent), Xanthan Gum (thickener), 1,2-Hexanediol (emollient), Glycine (emollient).
how_to_use: Massage 1 pump in circular motions around eye area, then gently tap into skin.

reviews.headline: Just sits on skin, does not sink in
reviews.comments: This product never sinks into skin, no matter how much it is gently patted in. I used it every night for 2 weeks, and woke up with sticky under eyes each day. Also, it burns like heck if you get any in your eyes, and my eyes are sensitive, so just using something that did not sink in caused them to tear up. The cream not sinking in also means it is not getting into deeper layers of skin, so I saw no difference after the 2 weeks of use. Each time you pump it out (1 pump is more than enough for both eyes, too much, actually) there is a hard piece that was left in the spout from the last time you used it that has to be thrown away.

reviews.headline: I will keep using this!
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this cream and my eyes feel amazing. It's soft and not irritating and very hydrating.

reviews.headline: Love this supple eye cream
reviews.comments: This barrier repair eye cream is a great eye cream to have on hand. I really love the packaging and the ingredients are clean and the texture is soft, super supple and penetrating. I would definitely repurchase.

reviews.headline: Awesome
reviews.comments: I use this every night after my retinaldehyde eye serum. I use it during the day sometimes and it works great too. This eye cream keeps my   delicate eye area free from irritation. I will repurchase.

reviews.headline: Incredible Eye Cream- Read review
reviews.comments: If you have consistant dry, irritated, aging eyes this eye cream is for you!! I'll gove you some background- I just turned 30 in March, and I never had issues with dryness anywhere on my face especially the eye area. I always had oily lids. Well, after turning 30 I IMMEDIATELY got extremely dry eyes on my lids, corners, and underneath to wear they itched and even would be inflammed from rubbing them. So much dryness there were massive dry skin flakes after waking up. I let it go for a couple of weeks as I thought it would go away- nope. I was at my sister-in-law's house, and she had some Byoma products in rhe guest bathroom and used them. Love them!!! I went to Ulta to pick some of those items up the next day, and I saw this eye cream. It was so affordable and it said 'barrier repair' so I gave it a whirl. Y'all- this eye cream made my eyes back to normal after one use, overnight. I was AMAZED. I am going to keep using this product, as it's lightweight and made my eye area look better than ever. Also dermatologist recommended? Yes please! Coupons and ulta points work on it making this a no-brainer.

reviews.headline: Great Eye Cream
reviews.comments: I love this eye cream.  Im 43 years old. Ance prone t zone oily here but i have dry undereye. This is the best eye cream ive used so far that works for hydration and works soooo good under concealer/makeup!  I use this day and night.  At night use a retinol eyecream and then i layer this eyecream over it to lock in hydration.  Sooooo good and affordable i mean what wlse can u ask for!  Trust me you will love it!

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again, very satisfied.
reviews.comments: I have seen improvement in texture and glow.

reviews.headline: First time trying this to combat allergies site effects
reviews.comments: Allergy season is hitting really hard this year and the skin around my eyes is really suffering. This brings relief by moisturizing and combating redness and inflammation. It doesn't add additional irritation or is stinging while applying it so it's a win. I'm waiting for my skin to fully recover to see what else this eye cream can do. But overall it's helping me a lot

reviews.headline: Wah
reviews.comments: Unfortunately this causes my skin to breakout along my cheeks underneath my eye area whenever I apply it. It feels really nice and creamy, not too thick or uncomfortable. I love the pump, though the packaging itself is quite bulky which I'm not a fan of. Will be using this up on my body instead! 32/oily-combo skin

reviews.headline: Great eye cream
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] First of all, I love skin products that have no scent and that alone makes me highly rate this product! The texture is lovely against my skin and doesn't feel like I'm adding extra weight. I haven't seen much of a difference, but will continue to use it!

reviews.headline: Beautiful Bright Eyes Please?
reviews.comments:
I received this product in exchange for my honest review, and I am thrilled with the results! Some of the ingredients, like barrier lipids, copper tripeptide, and ectoin, were new to me, but together they work beautifully. Before using this product, the skin under my eyes looked dull and had a crepey texture. After just one week of applying one pump under each eye every morning after cleansing and toning, I noticed a significant improvement. My under-eye area appeared brighter and smoother, with less of a bruised look—it felt transformed.

This product truly delivers results, just like every Korean beauty product I've tried. However, I do have one suggestion: the bottle design could be updated to hold more product, as this little bottle didn't last long for me. I liked it so much that I purchased another from Ulta right away!

I highly recommend this amazing product. After reading more about the brand on their website, I have a better understanding of how these unique ingredients benefit the skin. I'm already exploring other BYOMA products—if you're looking for skincare that works, you should check them out too!

reviews.headline: I would buy again
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Great product! Really hydrates the under eye area and leaves my skin feeling nourished. Packaging is also cute. No strong smell which is great!

reviews.headline: Great Product
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Love this eye creme! It has a smooth texture that absorbs quickly and does not have a strong scent,which is refreshing. The nettle with the pump makes it easy to apply.  I noticed a difference in my fine lines after a week that just kept improving!

reviews.headline: Loveeeeee
reviews.comments: Love it. So moisturizing!!!

reviews.headline: My favorite cream from now on
reviews.comments: I was about to repurchase my usual favorite eye cream for $25, but decided to give this one a try—and I'm so glad I did! The texture is rich and thick, which feels amazing under the eyes, and it provides just the right amount of hydration without feeling greasy. It absorbs well and keeps my under-eye area moisturized throughout the day. For the price, you really can't beat it. Definitely a new favorite in my skincare routine!

reviews.headline: Good eye cream
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] The packaging is pretty and the pump works well. It feels pleasant on my skin. It isn't greasy, absorbs nicely, and smells good. I haven't noticed any difference in my skin yet though.

reviews.headline: Gentle, Hydrating, and Effective
reviews.comments:
I've been using the BYOMA Barrier Repair Eye Cream for a few weeks now, and I'm genuinely impressed. The texture is lightweight yet deeply hydrating, and it absorbs quickly without feeling greasy or heavy. It's super gentle on my sensitive under-eye area and leaves my skin feeling smooth, refreshed, and well-moisturized.

I've noticed a visible difference in how bright and healthy my under-eyes look — less puffiness and dryness, and a softer, more even texture. I also appreciate the clean, minimal packaging and the skin barrier-supporting ingredients, which makes me feel good about what I'm putting on my skin.

Definitely a new staple in my skincare routine. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a dependable, soothing eye cream that actually delivers.

reviews.headline: Must have
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I don't even know where to begin with this product. I personally have very dry, acne prone skin. I'm also in the process of integrating a retinol eye cream into my routine. This eye cream is very hydrating on its own, but this shines when it can complement a product. I will mix this with my retinol the cream and my under eyes have never looked better. 

For during the day, it's great as a makeup prep step and doesn't pill or get weird as well. For its price point it is a definite must try.

reviews.headline: Amazing moisturizer!!
reviews.comments: I had been looking for a cheap and effective under eye cream and was struggling until I found this product. It's super hydrating, texture is great, and easy to use! I used to get little dry patches under my eyes and now they're gone. I also noticed less creases when doing my under eye concelear. Love this product so much plus the bottle is super cute! I definitely recommend this for someone who needs a moisterizing eye cream without breaking the bank!!

reviews.headline: Loved it!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Byoma Barrier Repair eye cream was great! It came in the cutest  packaging! Felt great on the skin and made my under eyes  visibly look better! I used this daily for a month, but I saw results after three days! This is a MUST TRY!

faceoff_positive.comments:
I've seen Byoma products in stores for a while but never got around to trying them, so I was keen to see if they lived up to the praise they have been getting.

First things first, the eye cream is a great product; it has a luxurious silky feel that leaves my eye area feeling hydrated but not greasy, and the texture gives it a premium feel despite its very affordable price. Its fragrance-free formulation also reduces the likelihood of skin reactions. It also contains active ingredients that have nourished my skin, leaving it smooth and glowy after a month of use.

However, I do have a gripe with the packaging; it's that the pump is ill-suited for an eye cream. One pump dispenses a volume much more fitting for a face cream, and I have to resort to doing multiple partial pumps to dispense the usual rice grain-sized amount. The cap is also not air tight; the cream in the tip of the pump can dry up slightly even after half a day, resulting in a solid lump that needs to be mixed to smoothen it out. When fitting the cap back onto the bottle, it can also snap onto one side of the bottle but not the other, making it look like it is closed when it is actually not secured.

Overall, I feel that it is a great product that gives major bang for your buck - it is very hydrating and feels luxe, while being priced accessibly. However, a star has to be docked because of the negative user experience. This is purely because of the packaging design, and I hope that it will be remedied by replacing it with a container and pump that is air-tight and more suited for an eye cream.

Disclaimer: product was received in exchange for a review.
faceoff_positive.headline: Great product, mediocre user experience

faceoff_negative.comments: I've been using this product consistently 2x daily for a week now.  I will preface this by saying I am a sucker for a product in a pump component- I will sacrifice a higher price or a marginally lower quality product for a pump.  So I was so excited to see this release from Byoma.  The product itself is great- super hydrating, not too thick, and gentle around my eyes.  I love the pump, except for the fact that because this is a more emollient formula, the cap needs to be more airtight.  Each time I apply it, the product has crusted/gooped up inside the hole of the pump, and I have to fish our the goopy bit from what I've pumped out.  It's not a huge issue, but it's inconvenient, a little gross, and wasteful.  As I mentioned, I use this twice a day so it does not take very long for it to dry out.  This product needs a better lid/seal and it would easily be 5 stars.
faceoff_negative.headline: Needs packaging re-design
